text: Scott M. Stringer (born April 29, 1960) is an American politician. He was the New York City Comptroller and a New York Democratic politician. He was the 26th Borough President of Manhattan. In September 2020, he announced his plans to run for Mayor of New York City for the 2021 election. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Manhattan borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Scott Stringer
